## Runtime.RuntimeResourceResolver.resolveDecision() method

Resolves a decision by evaluating all its constituent condition sets against the current context. Uses O(1) caching based on the decision's globally unique sequential index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
resolveDecision(decision: AbstractDecision): Result<DecisionResolutionResult>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

decision


</td><td>

[AbstractDecision](./ts-res.decisions.abstractdecision.md)


</td><td>

The [abstract decision](./ts-res.decisions.abstractdecision.md) to resolve.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[DecisionResolutionResult](./ts-res.runtime.decisionresolutionresult.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the [resolution result](./ts-res.runtime.decisionresolutionresult.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if the decision cannot be resolved.
